long_description: The Mirrycle Incredibell Omnibell bike bell has an adjustable band clamp that can be rotated to any position for convenient mounting anywhere on your handlebar. Mounting flexibility allows you to use thumb or any finger to ring the bell. Fits handlebars with 22mm - 31.8mm outside diameters.
short_description: The Mirrycle Incredibell Omnibell bike bell has an adjustable band clamp that can be rotated to any position for convenient mounting anywhere on your handlebar.
